name: @learnin/ui5-validator
description: Validator library for OpenUI5 or SAPUI5 applications.

scripts.doc-ja: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-rename-defaults --readme api-doc.md --lang jp --out docs/ja src/learnin/ui5/validator/Validator.ts
scripts.doc-en: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-rename-defaults --readme api-doc.md --lang en --out docs/en src/learnin/ui5/validator/Validator.ts

author: Manabu Inoue
